Class Tower

java.lang.Object
data.Tower
All Implemented Interfaces:
Entity
Direct Known Subclasses:
TowerBallista, TowerCannon, TowerChicken, TowerIce, TowerOrc, TowerWizard
public abstract class Tower extends Object implements Entity
The superclass for the towers.
Author:
Paul

    • update

      public void update()
      update method, checks if there is no targer, then find target. if it's targeted, calculates angle and shoots if has range.
      Specified by:
      update in interface Entity

    • draw

      public void draw()
      draws the tower. the tower has a base texture and a top texture. the top texture can rotate.
      Specified by:
      draw in interface Entity
